param.name: query
param.doc: String value. Optional. Default value of ' '. The query string that will be submitted to the Truveo video search engine. This string contains your search terms and can also include Boolean operators, modifiers, filters and sorters. For a complete listing of the supported functionality, see the documentation on search query syntax. If no query string or a blank query string is provided, this method will return the top videos ordered by vrank.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method can be used to submit a query to the Truveo video search service. This method returns the set of video results that match the submitted query.
